title: Lucy Hart
text:
Education:
Professional Science Master’s in Ecosystem Science and Sustainability- Concentration in Greenhouse Gas Management, Expected May 2027
Bachelor’s in Organizational Workforce and Leadership Studies- Concentration in Exercise Science, Graduated May 2025
Experience:
Environmental sustainability, exercise science, coaching, childcare, sales, marketing, content creation, retail, customer service

title: About Me
text:
Hi! My name is Lucy Hart and I am a student in the Professional Science Master’s in Ecosystem Science and Sustainability program.
I love exploring the outdoors, playing soccer, snowboarding, running, hiking, and traveling.
I am a salesperson and the marketing lead at a ski and snowboard shop in Colorado Springs.
